item.title: Welcome co-op students Linhui Chen and Dongyu Zhou joining our lab!
item.description: Linhui Chen and Dongyu Zhou officially join Li Lab today. Hope they have an enjoyable and fruitful time here!

item.title: Cumulus featured workspace on Terra is updated
item.description:
The Cumulus featured workspace on Terra platform has been updated.

Users who are interested in using cloud computing for single-cell data analysis can take it as an example to learn about Cumulus. In specific, this featured workspace uses a real-world dataset, and performs the process on gene-count matrix generation and the downstream analysis.

item.title: Cumulus is introduced in Pfizer Workshop
item.description:
Yiming Yang and Hui Ma from Li Lab has taken the lead in a tutorial workshop for Pfizer researchers working on single-cell analysis, which was coordiated by Verily Life Science.

In this tutorial, Cumulus workflows, Pegasus analysis module in Python, and Cirrocumulus, a cloud-based visualizer on single-cell data, were introduced using a real-world dataset.

item.title: The Cumulus paper is published!
item.description: Cumulus paper is published in Nature Methods journal. You can find the paper here.

item.title: Welcome co-op student Hui Ma joining our lab!
item.description: Hui Ma officially joins Li Lab today. Although this is a tough time all over the country, hope she could have a time learning a lot and having fun in our lab!

item.title: The Cumulus manuscript is posted on bioRxiv!
item.description: Cumulus manuscript is posted on bioRxiv. You can find the manuscript here.

item.title: Our nucleus hashing and DemuxEM paper is published in Nature Communications today!
The Li Lab website is created!
